SETTINGS_DESC:
Changes the settings of MintWatch.
You can also open this from the wrench icon in the header of MintWatch.

pmwforcepagehls.name: Force video to be loaded via page script
pmwforcepagehls.hint:
Always use page scripts to load videos. (Default for Firefox environment)
May help if videos do not load properly in some environments, but should not be enabled if it is working properly.

pmwlayouttype.name: Layout of the watch page
pmwlayouttype.hint: Specifies the appearance of MintWatch. Style changes when using Shinjuku.

pmwplayertype.name: Player theme
pmwplayertype.hint: Specifies the appearance of the player used in MintWatch.

commentListType.name: Comment list display
commentListType.hint: Specifies the design of the comment list

layoutDensity.name: Overall page style
layoutDensity.hint: Specifies the overall padding, corner rounding, and other styles

colorPalette.name: Theme
colorPalette.hint: If PM+ palette settings are enabled, this setting will not be applied

showExtendedRecommend.name: Display Statistics on Video Cards
showExtendedRecommend.hint: Displays statistics on video cards in the recommendations section

pageReplaceDescription.name:
Try these MintWatch-style pages with a mini player.
These experimental features may change anytime.

enableReshogi.name: Experimental: Enable replacement of the ranking page (Re:Shogi)

enableSearchPage.name: Experimental: Enable replacement of the search page

enableFixedHeader.name: Enable Fixed Header
enableFixedHeader.hint: The header will always be displayed even when scrolling. It remains hidden during fullscreen mode.

headerActionType.name: Header Action Display Type
headerActionType.hint: Sets how to open notifications or My Menu in the header.

navbarType.name: Navigation bar display type
navbarType.hint: Set how to display the navigation bar. This setting is ignored in Shinjuku layout.

disallowGridFallback.name: Disable grid fallback based on screen width

shinjukuEnableNavbar.name: Show navigation bar in Shinjuku layout

showLiveInRecommend.name: Show live stream in recommend section

autoScrollPositionOnVideoChange.name: Automatic scroll position when moving video
